description: Thousands take to the streets of Moscow to mark five years since the murder of Boris Nemtsov.
title: Boris Nemtsov: Russians march in memory of slain Putin opponent
title_page: Boris Nemtsov: Russians march in memory of slain Putin opponent - BBC News
maintext: He said the changes would make the constitution more democratic and more effective, but the proposals have been widely seen as a way of allowing him to extend his grip on power after leaving the presidency.
